text: we've just got hold of a draft copy of
what we believe is president Trump's
executive order on what they say is
protecting American people from terror
attacks now one of the key points in
that is that the US will suspend its
refugee admissions program for 120 days
and most crucially refugees coming from
Syria will be banned from entering
America indefinitely until there are
changes made to the refugee program here
the other key point in this is that the
Department of Defense has 90 days to
create safe areas for Syrian refugees in
Syria and in the surrounding areas and
the other big takeaway from this is that
this executive order suspends people who
are coming from Division Oh countries
from entering the United States it
doesn't list the countries but we've
been told that division o means that
anyone coming from Iran Iraq Libya
Somalia Sudan Syria and Yemen won't be
allowed to enter the United States for
30 days from when the order is signed
this is a draft it's subject to change
and of course it will be hugely
controversial here
